## Getting Started

This is an example of how you may give instructions on setting up your project locally.
To get a local copy up and running follow these simple example steps.

### Prerequisites

This is an example of how to list things you need to use the software and how to install them.

* npm

```sh
npm install npm@latest -g
```

### Installation

â˜‘ï¸Clone the repository to your local machine.
â˜‘ï¸Navigate to the project directory in your terminal.
â˜‘ï¸Install the dependencies by running npm install.
â˜‘ï¸Start the development server by running npm run dev.
â˜‘ï¸Open the website in your browser at http://localhost:3000.

## Usage

â˜‘ï¸Build the website by running npm run build.
â˜‘ï¸Deploy the public directory to your hosting provider.
â˜‘ï¸Update the data directory to include your personal information, 
     experiences, and projects.
â˜‘ï¸Modify the src directory to change the website's layout, design, or functionality.
